Question: कोई "आधार पीवीसी कार्ड" के लिए कैसे अनुरोध कर सकता है?
Answer: "आधार पीवीसी कार्ड" के लिए अनुरोध यूआईडीएआई की आधिकारिक वेबसाइट (https://www.uidai.gov.in या https://myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in/genricPVC/hi) या mAadhaar एप्लिकेशन पर जाकर किया जा सकता है।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: पंजीकृत मोबाइल नंबर के उपयोग द्वारा कैसे अनुरोध करें?
Answer: 1. कृपया https://uidai.gov.in या https://myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in/genricPVC/hi पर जाएं "ऑर्डर आधार कार्ड" सेवा पर क्लिक करें।2. अपना 12 अंकों का आधार नंबर (यूआईडी) या 16 अंकों का वर्चुअल आइडेंटिफिकेशन नंबर (वीआईडी) या 28 अंकों का नामांकन आईडी दर्ज करें।3. सुरक्षा कोड दर्ज करें4. यदि आपके पास टीओटीपी है, तो चेक बॉक्स में क्लिक करके विकल्प "मेरे पास टीओटीपी है" चुनें अन्यथा "ओटीपी का अनुरोध करें" बटन पर क्लिक करें।5. पंजीकृत मोबाइल नंबर पर प्राप्त ओटीपी/टीओटीपी दर्ज करें।6. "नियम एवं शर्तें" के सामने चेक बॉक्स पर क्लिक करें। (नोट: विवरण देखने के लिए हाइपर लिंक पर क्लिक करें)।7. ओटीपी/टीओटीपी सत्यापन पूरा करने के लिए "सबमिट" बटन पर क्लिक करें।8. अगली स्क्रीन पर, पुनर्मुद्रण के लिए ऑर्डर देने से पहले निवासी द्वारा सत्यापन के लिए आधार विवरण का पूर्वावलोकन दिखाई देगा।9. “भुगतान करें” पर क्लिक करें। आपको क्रेडिट/डेबिट कार्ड, नेट बैंकिंग और यूपीआई जैसे भुगतान विकल्पों के साथ पेमेंट गेटवे पेज पर पुनः निर्देशित किया जाएगा।10. सफल भुगतान के बाद, डिजिटल हस्ताक्षर वाली रसीद तैयार हो जाएगी जिसे निवासी पीडीएफ प्रारूप में डाउनलोड कर सकते हैं। निवासी को एसएमएस के माध्यम से सेवा अनुरोध संख्या भी प्राप्त होगी।11. आधार कार्ड की स्थिति जांचें पर निवासी आधार कार्ड भेजे जाने तक एसआरएन की स्थिति को ट्रैक कर सकता है।12. DoP से भेजे जाने के बाद AWB नंबर वाला एसएमएस भी भेजा जाएगा। निवासी डीओपी वेबसाइट पर जाकर डिलीवरी की स्थिति को ट्रैक कर सकते हैं।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: मुझे दस्तावेज़ कब तक जमा करने चाहिए?
Answer: आधार नंबर धारकों को सुझाव दिया जाता है कि वे 10 साल में कम से कम एक बार आधार में दस्तावेज़ अपडेट करें। एक बार जब आपको इस संबंध में कोई संचार प्राप्त होता है, तो दस्तावेजों को शीघ्र अद्यतन करने का सुझाव दिया जाता है।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: मुझे अपने आधार में दस्तावेज़ क्यों अपडेट करने चाहिए?
Answer: बेहतर सेवा वितरण और सटीक आधार आधारित प्रमाणीकरण के लिए आप अपने आधार डेटाबेस में दस्तावेज़ों को अपडेट कर सकते हैं। इसलिए, हालिया पहचान और पते के दस्तावेजों को अपडेट करना आधार नंबर धारक के हित में है।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: आधार में दस्तावेज़ अपडेट करने के लिए मैं कौन से दस्तावेज़ जमा कर सकता हूँ?
Answer:
दस्तावेज़ को अपडेट करने के लिए, आपको अपना पहचान प्रमाण (POI) और पते का प्रमाण (POA) जमा करना होगा।
POI और POA दोनों के रूप में स्वीकार किए जाने वाले कुछ सामान्य दस्तावेज़:राशन पत्रिकामतदाता पहचान पत्रभामाशाह, निवास प्रमाण पत्र, निवास प्रमाण पत्र, जन-आधार, मनरेगा/एनआरईजीएस जॉब कार्ड, श्रमिक कार्ड आदि।भारतीय पासपोर्टशाखा प्रबंधक/प्रभारी द्वारा प्रमाण पत्र के साथ सार्वजनिक क्षेत्र के बैंक द्वारा जारी फोटोयुक्त पासबुक
कुछ सामान्य दस्तावेज़ केवल POI के रूप में स्वीकार किए जाते हैं:
फोटो के साथ स्कूल छोड़ने का प्रमाण पत्र / स्कूल स्थानांतरण प्रमाण पत्रफोटो के साथ मान्यता प्राप्त शिक्षा बोर्ड या विश्वविद्यालय द्वारा जारी मार्कशीट/प्रमाण पत्रपैन/ई-पैन कार्डसीजीएचएस कार्डड्राइविंग लाइसेंस
कुछ सामान्य दस्तावेज़ केवल पीओए के रूप में स्वीकार किए जाते हैं:
बिजली, पानी, गैस या टेलीफोन/मोबाइल/ब्रॉडबैंड बिल (तीन महीने से अधिक पुराना नहीं)फोटोग्राफ के साथ विधिवत हस्ताक्षरित और मुहर लगी अनुसूचित वाणिज्यिक बैंक / डाकघर पासबुकविधिवत हस्ताक्षरित और मुहर लगी अनुसूचित वाणिज्यिक बैंक/डाकघर खाता/क्रेडिट-कार्ड विवरण (तीन महीने से अधिक पुराना नहीं)वैध किराया, पट्टा या छुट्टी और लाइसेंस समझौतानामित अधिकारियों द्वारा यूआईडीएआई मानक प्रमाणपत्र प्रारूप में जारी प्रमाण पत्रसंपत्ति कर रसीद (एक वर्ष से अधिक पुरानी नहीं)सहायक दस्तावेजों की विस्तृत सूची यहां उपलब्ध है - सहायक दस्तावेजों की सूची
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: मैं दस्तावेज़ ऑनलाइन कैसे जमा कर सकता हूँ?
Answer: कृपया MyAadhaar पोर्टल पर जाएं, और अपने आधार नंबर और अपने पंजीकृत मोबाइल नंबर पर प्राप्त वन-टाइम पासवर्ड (OTP) का उपयोग करके लॉग इन करें।सहायक दस्तावेजों की सूची यहां उपलब्ध है - सहायक दस्तावेजों की सूची

Question: यदि मेरी प्रोफ़ाइल में प्रदर्शित पता मेरे वर्तमान पते से मेल नहीं खाता है, तो मुझे क्या करना चाहिए?
Answer: आप myAadhaar पोर्टल के माध्यम से या वैध POA दस्तावेज़ के साथ नामांकन करके किसी भी आधार नामांकन केंद्र पर जाकर अपना पता ऑनलाइन अपडेट कर सकते हैं।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: यदि कोई जनसांख्यिकीय विवरण (नाम, लिंग या जन्म तिथि) मेरे वास्तविक पहचान विवरण से मेल नहीं खाता है, तो मुझे क्या करना चाहिए?
Answer: आप किसी भी आधार नामांकन केंद्र पर जाकर आधार में कोई भी जनसांख्यिकीय विवरण अपडेट कर सकते हैं।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: अगर मैं आधार नामांकन केंद्र के माध्यम से दस्तावेज़ जमा करना चाहता हूं, तो मैं आधार केंद्र कैसे ढूंढ सकता हूं?
Answer: कृपया भुवन आधार पोर्टल पर जाएं आस-पास के आधार केंद्रों का पता लगाने के लिए, 'आस-पास केंद्र' टैब पर क्लिक करें। आस-पास के आधार केंद्र देखने के लिए अपना स्थान विवरण दर्ज करें।अपने पिन कोड क्षेत्र के भीतर आधार केंद्रों का पता लगाने के लिए, 'पिन कोड द्वारा खोजें' टैब पर क्लिक करें। उस क्षेत्र में आधार केंद्र देखने के लिए अपने क्षेत्र का पिन कोड दर्ज करें।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: दस्तावेज़ जमा करने का शुल्क क्या है?
Answer: आधार केंद्र पर दस्तावेज़ जमा करने के लिए, लागू शुल्क रु. 50.दस्तावेज़ जमा करना myAadhaar पोर्टल के माध्यम से भी किया जा सकता है।

Question: मैं एक अनिवासी भारतीय (एनआरआई) हूं। मैं दस्तावेज़ कैसे जमा कर सकता हूं?
Answer: आप जब भी भारत में हों, ऑनलाइन या आधार केंद्र पर जाकर दस्तावेज़ जमा कर सकते हैं।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: मैं दस्तावेज़ कैसे जमा कर सकता हूँ?
Answer: दस्तावेज़ MyAadhaar पोर्टल के माध्यम से या किसी भी आधार नामांकन केंद्र पर ऑनलाइन जमा किए जा सकते हैं। इस संबंध में एक ट्यूटोरियल वीडियो के लिए, कृपया यहां क्लिक करें https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1jne0KzFcF8

Question: मैं अपना वीआईडी भूल गया। यूआईडी लॉक करने के बाद मैं इसे कैसे प्राप्त कर सकता हूं?
Answer: यूआईडी लॉक करने के बाद यदि निवासी वीआईडी भूल गया है, तो निवासी 16 अंकों वाली वीआईडी प्राप्त करने के लिए एसएमएस सेवा का उपयोग कर सकता है। निवासी को उसके रजिस्टर मोबाइल नंबर पर वीआईडी प्राप्त होगी।आधार रजिस्टर मोबाइल नंबर से 1947 पर एसएमएस भेजें,आरवीआईडी स्पेस यूआईडी के अंतिम 4 या 8 अंक।उदाहरण:- आरवीआईडी 1234"
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: निवासी यूआईडी कैसे अनलॉक कर सकते हैं?
Answer: यूआईडी को अनलॉक करने के लिए निवासी के पास नवीनतम 16 अंकों की वीआईडी होनी चाहिए और यदि निवासी 16 अंकों की वीआईडी भूल गया है तो वह एसएमएस सेवाओं के माध्यम से नवीनतम वीआईडी प्राप्त कर सकता है।आरवीआईडी स्पेस यूआईडी के अंतिम 4 या 8 अंक। 1947 पर एसएमएस करें। उदाहरण- आरवीआईडी 1234यूआईडी को अनलॉक करने के लिए, निवासी यूआईडीएआई की वेबसाइट (https://resident.uidai.gov.in/aadhaar-lockunlock) पर जा सकते हैं, अनलॉक रेडियो बटन का चयन करें, नवीनतम वीआईडी और सुरक्षा कोड दर्ज करें और सेंड ओटीपी पर क्लिक करें या टीओटीपी का चयन करें और सबमिट पर क्लिक करें। . आपका यूआईडी सफलतापूर्वक अनलॉक हो जाएगा।निवासी एमआधार ऐप के माध्यम से भी आधार लॉक या अनलॉक सेवा का उपयोग कर सकते हैं।"
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: निवासी यूआईडी कैसे लॉक कर सकते हैं?
Answer: यूआईडी लॉक करने के लिए, निवासी के पास 16 अंकों का वीआईडी नंबर होना चाहिए और यह लॉक करने के लिए पूर्व-आवश्यकता है। यदि निवासी के पास वीआईडी नहीं है तो वह एसएमएस सेवा या यूआईडीएआई वेबसाइट (www.myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in) के माध्यम से जनरेट कर सकता है।एसएमएस सेवा. जीवीआईडी स्थान यूआईडी के अंतिम 4 या 8 अंक। 1947 पर एसएमएस करें। उदाहरण- जीवीआईडी 1234।निवासी यूआईडीएआई की वेबसाइट (https://resident.uidai.gov.in/aadhaar-lockunlock) पर जा सकते हैं, माई आधार टैब के तहत, आधार लॉक और अनलॉक सेवाओं पर क्लिक करें। यूआईडी लॉक रेडियो बटन का चयन करें और नवीनतम विवरण के अनुसार यूआईडी नंबर, पूरा नाम और पिन कोड दर्ज करें और सुरक्षा कोड दर्ज करें। सेंड ओटीपी पर क्लिक करें या टीओटीपी चुनें और सबमिट पर क्लिक करें। आपका यूआईडी सफलतापूर्वक लॉक कर दिया जाएगा।"
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: आधार (यू. आई. डी.) लॉक एंड अनलॉक क्या है?
Answer:
एक निवासी के लिए, व्यक्तिगत डेटा की सुरक्षा और गोपनीयता हमेशा एक प्राथमिक चिंता का विषय है। उसकी आधार संख्या की सुरक्षा को मजबूत करने और निवासी को नियंत्रण प्रदान करने के लिए, यू. आई. डी. ए. आई. आधार संख्या (यू. आई. डी.) को लॉक करने और उसे खोलने का एक तंत्र प्रदान करता है।
निवासी अपना आधार (यूआईडी) यूआईडीएआई की वेबसाइट ( www.myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in) या mAadhaar ऐप के माध्यम से लॉक कर सकता है।
 ऐसा करने से निवासी बायोमेट्रिक्स, जनसांख्यिकीय और ओ. टी. पी. तौर-तरीकों के लिए यू. आई. डी., यू. आई. डी. टोकन और वी. आई. डी. का उपयोग करके किसी भी प्रकार का प्रमाणीकरण नहीं कर सकता है  यदि निवासी यू. आई. डी. को खोलना चाहता है तो वह यू. आई. डी. ए. आई. वेबसाइट या एम. आधार ऐप के माध्यम से नवीनतम वी. आई. डी. का उपयोग करके ऐसा कर सकता है। आधार (यू. आई. डी.) को खोलने के बाद, निवासी यू. आई. डी., यू. आई. डी. टोकन और वी. आई. डी. का उपयोग करके प्रमाणीकरण कर सकते हैं।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: मेरा एसएमएस नहीं भेजा जा रहा है। मुझे क्या करना चाहिए?
Answer: कृपया जांचें कि आपकी एसएमएस सेवा ठीक से काम कर रही है या नहीं। एसएमएस नहीं भेजे जाने के संबंध में किसी भी समस्या के मामले में, कृपया अपने दूरसंचार सेवा प्रदाता से संपर्क करें। यह खराब नेटवर्क या गैर-कार्यशील एसएमएस सेवा या कम बैलेंस आदि का मामला हो सकता है।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: एसएमएस सेवा के साथ आधार नंबर को कैसे लॉक/अनलॉक करें?
Answer: आधार नंबर लॉक करने के लिए:ओटीपी अनुरोध इस प्रकार भेजें -> > GETOTPआधार के अंतिम 4 या 8 नंबर, फिर लॉकिंग अनुरोध इस प्रकार भेजें -> आधार संख्या के अंतिम 4 या 8 अंक लॉक करें, 6 अंक ओटीपीआपको अपने अनुरोध के लिए एक पुष्टिकरण संदेश मिलेगा। एक बार यह लॉक हो जाने पर आप अपने आधार नंबर का उपयोग करके किसी भी प्रकार का प्रमाणीकरण (बायोमेट्रिक, जनसांख्यिकीय या ओटीपी) नहीं कर पाएंगे। हालाँकि, आप प्रमाणीकरण करने के लिए अभी भी अपनी नवीनतम वर्चुअल आईडी का उपयोग कर सकते हैं।आधार नंबर को अन-लॉक करने के लिए आपके पास अपनी नवीनतम वर्चुअल आईडी होनी चाहिए।वर्चुअल आईडी नंबर के अंतिम 6 या 10 अंकों के साथ -> के रूप में ओटीपी अनुरोध भेजेंGETOTPLAST 6 या 10 अंकों की वर्चुअल आईडीफिर अनलॉकिंग अनुरोध इस प्रकार भेजें -> UNLOCKUIDLAST 6 या 10 अंकों की वर्चुअल आईडी 6 अंकों का ओटीपी"
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: क्या मुझे सभी आधार एसएमएस सेवाओं के लिए ओटीपी जनरेट करने की आवश्यकता है?
Answer: आधार लॉक/अनलॉक और बायोमेट्रिक लॉक/अनलॉक फ़ंक्शन के लिए ओटीपी प्रमाणीकरण आवश्यक है। आपको वीआईडी जनरेशन और पुनर्प्राप्ति फ़ंक्शन के लिए ओटीपी की आवश्यकता नहीं है।ओटीपी प्राप्त करने के लिए एसएमएस भेजें -> GETOTPआधार के अंतिम 4 या 8 नंबरउदाहरण - GETOTP 1234.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: आधार एसएमएस सेवा क्या है?
Answer: भारतीय विशिष्ट पहचान प्राधिकरण (यूआईडीएआई) ने "एसएमएस पर आधार सेवाएं" नामक एक सेवा शुरू की है जो आधार संख्या धारकों को, जिनके पास इंटरनेट/निवासी पोर्टल/एम-आधार आदि तक पहुंच नहीं है, वर्चुअल आईडी जेनरेशन/पुनर्प्राप्ति, आधार लॉक/अनलॉक आदि जैसी विभिन्न आधार सेवाओं का एसएमएस के माध्यम से उपयोग करने में सक्षम बनाती है।
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to aadhar in hindi.

Question: 1 - Whether an employer can deduct employer’s share of contribution from the wages of employees?
Answer: Ans : No. It is not permissible. Any such deduction is a criminal offence.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 2 - Can the wages be reduced by the employer on account of payment to the EPF?
Answer: Ans : No. It is specifically barred under section-12 of the EPF & MP Act,1952.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 3 - Whether a daily rated employee or the piece rated employee can become a member of the EPF?
Answer: Ans : Yes.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 4 - If an employee is paid wages on daily basis or on piece rate basis how the contribution is determined?
Answer: Ans : The wages paid in a calendar month will be taken to determine the contribution due.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 5 - Whether the member is entitled for full interest on the belated deposit of PF dues by the employer?
Answer: Ans : After realising the dues, the PF members will be given full interest for each due month and it will in no way affect the interest due to members on the contributions paid. The employer shall be charged penal interest under section 7Q and penal damages under section 14B of the Act respectively.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 6 - An employee is paid subsistence allowance during the period of his suspension. Whether PF contribution is payable on this?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 7 - Can an employee contribute to the EPF after leaving the service?
Answer: Ans : No. In the absence of wages & Employer no recovery can be affected. Any contribution by the member must be matched with employer’s share of contribution.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 8 - The contribution has been recovered from the wages of the employee but the employer had not paid to the EPF. What is the remedy?
Answer: Ans : The Employees’ PF Organization will invoke penal provisions of the Act to recover the dues from the employer. Complaint can be lodged with Police under section-406/409 of IPC by the EPFO for action against such employers.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 9 - What will be the effect of non-payment of PF dues by an employer? Or how a member is affected for non-payment of EPF dues by the employer?
Answer: Ans : The Provident Fund amount due to the member will be paid only to the extent of the amount realised from the employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 10 - Whether an employer can recover any outstanding dues from the PF amount payable to a member?
Answer: Ans : No. It is totally prohibited.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 11 - What are the measures by which the PF amount is recovered from a defaulting employer?
Answer: Ans : Attachment of Bank Accounts, Realisation of dues from Debtors, Attachment & Sale of properties, Arrest and Detention of the Employer, Action under Section 406/409 of Indian Penal Code and Section 110 of Criminal Procedure Code, Prosecution under section 14 of the EPF & MP Act,1952.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 12 - How a member is informed about the non-payment of contributions recovered from the wages of the employee but not paid to the EPF?
Answer: Ans : The Annual P.F. Statement of Account/Member Passbook will indicate the amount paid by the employer. The default period in a year is thus made known to the members. In the current scenario if the member has activated her/his UAN the non-payment/payment of contributions can be verified every month through the e-passbook. Currently, members also receive sms on their registered mobile phones on credit of monthly contribution into their PF account.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 13 - Whether the P.F. amount credited to the member can be attached against any liability?
Answer: Ans : No. The Provident Fund enjoys protection against attachment by any Court also as per the provisions of section 10 of the EPF & MP Act,1952.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 14 - When an employer becomes insolvent or when a company is wound up, whether the contributions will be paid in priority over other debts?
Answer: Ans : Yes.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 15 - When wages are not collected by the member whether the PF can be deducted or not?
Answer: Ans : The employer, before paying the member his wages, is required to deduct the PF contribution from his wages and pay to the Regional PF Commissioner. As such PF can be deducted.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 16 - Can a member pay contribution in excess of the statutory rate of 12%?
Answer: Ans : Yes. The member can pay voluntary contribution in excess of his normal contribution of 12% of Rs.15000/-. The total contribution i.e., voluntary + mandatory can be up to Rs.15000/- per month. (The employer may restrict his own share to the statutory rate). The member can also contribute on higher wages i.e., >15000/- after getting permission from APFC/RPFC as per the provisions of para-26(6) of the Scheme.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 17 - Can a member demand for showing the recovery of contributions from the employer?
Answer: Ans : Yes. The contribution card of each member in Form 3-A/ECR copy can be demanded from the employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 18 - How the contract employees are protected and given their P.F. when the contractor is not paying the dues to the principal employer?
Answer: Ans : It is the duty of the principal employer to ensure that the Contractor discharges his liability. The Principal Employer must allow payment of bills after ensuring that the Contractor has enrolled and complied in respect of all eligible contract employees every month. The Principle Employer can check the remittance and employee name by using the Establishment Search option available in our website www.epfindia.gov.in. The path is OUR SERVICES >> For Employers >> Important Links >> Establishment Search (Also view Remittances and member name). If the Principal Employer ensures that all contract employees activate their Universal Account Number (UAN), then any default by the contractor can be nipped in the bud.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 19 - Can a member refuse to part with the payment of contribution to the Pension Fund?
Answer: Ans : The Pension contribution is only a diversion from the employer’s share of Provident Fund. Hence no consent is required from the member and refusal does not arise.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 20 - Whether an employer can stop paying Employees’ Provident Fund contribution in respect of a member who had attained the age of 55 or 60?
Answer: Ans : No. The Employees’ Provident Fund Contribution should be paid till the date of his leaving the service, irrespective of the age of the member. Employees who ceases to be EPS(pension) member will get Employers 8.33% contribution in PF.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 21 - In case the PF amount is not settled within 20 days to whom the matter is to be reported?
Answer: Ans : He can approach the Regional P.F. Commissioner in charge of grievances; file a complaint on the website using the EPFiGMS feature in the section ‘FOR EMPLOYEES’. The url for the grievance page is http://epfigms.gov.in/ or he can appear before the Commissioner in the ‘Nidhi Apke Nikat’ program being conducted on 10th of every month.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 22 - Is there any time limit for withdrawal of Provident Fund dues?
Answer: Ans : Only in the case of resignation from service (not superannuation) a member has to wait for a period of two months for withdrawal of the PF amount.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 23 - When the employer is not attesting the claim form how to submit the application for withdrawal of provident fund?
Answer:
Ans : It is the duty of the employer to attest the application form. In case of any dispute, the member may attain attestation preferably from the bank in which he has maintained his account and thereafter submit the same to Regional PF Commissioner, explaining the reasons for not obtaining the signature of the employer. The Regional P.F. Commissioner will pursue the matter with the employer wherever necessary.
If the member has activated his Universal Account Number and linked his bank account and Aadhaar then he can submit composite claim (Aadhaar) which only requires the signature of the member.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 24 - In case of change in employment whether a member can get his PF account transferred?
Answer: Ans : On change in employment, the member should necessarily get his PF account transferred to his present establishment, duly submitting Form 13(R). A member can submit claim for transfer online using member interface at unified portal.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 25 - If past accumulations are not transferred on cancellation of exemption, how the provident fund amount is paid to the members?
Answer: Ans : The local RPFC will ensure transfer of securities/cash and arrange for refund of dues to the members.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 26 - How is a PF member informed of the transfer affected?
Answer: Ans : A copy of Transfer Certificate (Annexure-K) issued to the transferee Regional P.F. Commissioner/P.F. Trust giving full details of the transfer can be requested from the EPF office.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 27 - What is the method of crediting interest to the P.F. subscribers?
Answer: Ans : The compound interest is credited on monthly running balance basis at the statutory rate declared for each year. For 2016-17 the interest declared is 8.65%.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 28 - Whether provident fund provides for any refundable loan for Housing etc.?
Answer: Ans : No. But, non-refundable loans for housing are available.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 29 - I am an employee working in an establishment to which the PF Act is not applicable. Can I become a member of the EPF?
Answer: Ans : An employee can become a member only after the application of the Act to the establishment.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 30 - If an employee is not given the PF membership, to whom he can approach?
Answer: Ans : He can approach his employer failing which he can approach the Regional Provident Fund Commissioner of the nearest PF office.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 31 - Whether the employee working in a Branch Unit of an establishment located outside the state is eligible to become a member of the EPF?
Answer: Ans : The Act is applicable to an establishment as a whole. Hence, its employees, irrespective of their place of work or location, are eligible to become member of the Fund.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 32 - If an employee is working in more than one establishment how his membership is regulated?
Answer: Ans : His membership is reckoned separately for each establishment. (Under different Provident Fund Account Numbers/ member Ids)
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 33 - Can an employee become a member of EPF without any age restriction?
Answer: Ans : There is no age restriction for becoming a member of the Provident Fund, whereas an employee who has already attained the age of 58 cannot become a member of the Pension Fund.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 34 - Whether an employee can become a member of the EPF without any restriction to his salary/wages?
Answer: Ans : The employees who are drawing the basic wages and dearness allowance up to Rs.15, 000/- are alone eligible to become a member. He will continue to be a member even when his pay exceeds Rs.15, 000/-. However, his contribution to the Fund will be restricted to Rs.15, 000/-. The employer is also required to pay his matching contribution up to Rs.15, 000/-. Employees drawing more than Rs.15000/- can also become a member of EPF by giving option under para 26(6) of the EPF Scheme. The option has to be submitted to the EPF office within 6 months of joining of such member.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 35 - Whether an apprentice can become a member of the EPF?
Answer: Ans : No. But, when he ceases to be an apprentice he should be enrolled immediately.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 36 - If an employee is drawing more than Rs. 15000/- (Basic + DA only) is he required to become a member of the EPF?
Answer: Ans : Such employee is not required to become a member, if he is not already holding the PF membership. Otherwise, if both the employer and employee are willing, he can become a member by giving option under Para-26 (6) of the PF Scheme. The option has to be submitted to the EPF office within 6 months of joining of such member.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 37 - If an employee is transferred from one establishment to another establishment whether he is required to be enrolled as a member once again?
Answer: Ans : He is required to be enrolled as a member under the new establishment, for transferring his Provident Fund from his previous account.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 38 - If a person is working in an establishment without receiving any wages whether he can be given the PF membership?
Answer: Ans : Membership is allowed only where the wages are payable to an employee.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 39 - Whether an employee can become a member of the Pension Scheme only, without contributing to the PF?
Answer: Ans : No. By virtue of membership of Provident Fund only one can become a member of the Pension Scheme. From 01/09/2014 any new employee joining an establishment and drawing basic wage more than Rs.15000/- per month can only become a member of the PF after submitting option as per the provisions of Para 26(6) of the EPF Scheme. However, he can not get the membership to the Pension Fund. Both employee share of 12% and employer share of 12% contribution shall be paid into the Provident Fund only for all such employees.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 40 - Whether an employee can continue as a PF member even after his retirement?
Answer: Ans : Yes. If one continues to work even after attaining the superannuation age.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 41 - Is there any option available to an employee whether to become a member of the EPF or not?
Answer: Ans : No option.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 42 - Whether an EPF member can discontinue his membership, while in employment?
Answer: Ans : Not permissible.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 43 - Where an establishment is having its own recognized private PF Trust whether an employee can be allowed to continue in the private PF without joining the EPF?
Answer: Ans : Employee can be allowed to join the private PF Trust but the Trust has to take exemption from the EPF Scheme. He will however continue to be governed by the Pension and EDLI Schemes. All private trusts must obtain exemption from EPFO to enjoy Income Tax benefits.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 44 - How long an employee can continue his EPF membership?
Answer: Ans : There is no restriction of period for membership. Even after leaving the establishment a person can continue his membership. However, if no contribution is received into a PF account for 3 consecutive years the account shall not earn any interest after 3 years from the stopping of contribution.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 45 - How the period of non-employment between two spells of employment is treated under EPF?
Answer: Ans : Non employment period is not affecting the EPF but affects the calculation of service to decide the quantum of benefit under the Employees’ Pension Scheme.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 46 - What will happen for the EPF membership of an employee during the period of closure, lock-out, strike etc.?
Answer: Ans : During such period the membership will continue and in the absence of wages no recovery of contribution will be made.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 47 - Whether an employer can also join the PF?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 48 - Whether an employee can continue his EPF membership after leaving the employment?
Answer: Ans : Yes.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 49 - Whether any employee can join the EPF directly?
Answer: Ans : No. It is only by way of employment in an establishment covered under the provisions of the EPF & MP Act, 1952.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 50 - A Security Guard is working for different establishments; under whom he is required to secure membership?
Answer: Ans : If the employer of the Security Guard has been brought under the Act, the membership will be given through the employer, irrespective of his place of work.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 51 - If the establishment is not employing 20 persons, whether an employee can join the EPF?
Answer: Ans : Yes. The majority of employees and the employer can voluntarily opt for joining the Scheme as per provisions of Section-1(4) of the Act (Voluntary Coverage).
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 52 - What other benefits are accrued on joining the EPF?
Answer: Ans : On joining the EPF, the member is provided the benefits under Pension (restricted to employees with Rs.15000/- or less monthly wage) and Employees’ Deposit Linked Insurance Scheme.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 53 - Whether an employee already drawing Pension under EPS, 1995 is required to join the PF and Pension Fund?
Answer: Ans : He is required to join only the PF and he cannot become a member of the Pension Scheme.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 54 - An employee who joins an establishment at the age of 58 is eligible to become a member of the Pension Fund?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 55 - How long a member can retain his Provident Fund in his account?
Answer: Ans : The membership can be retained till the withdrawal of his Provident Fund dues. However, if the account does not receives any contributions for more than 3 years interest won’t be credited to the account after the 3rd year.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 56 - In the absence of nomination, how the P.F. amount of a deceased member is paid?
Answer: Ans : It is payable to the family members in equal shares, under Para 70 (ii) of EPF Scheme, 1952. If there is no eligible family member, it is payable to the person(s) who are legally entitled to it.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 57 - What is the need for giving nomination for pension?
Answer: Ans : On the death of a Pension member (before receiving the pension), if there is no eligible family member, pension is payable to the nominee.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 58 - In the absence of valid nomination and no family to whom the Pension amount is payable?
Answer: Ans : Payable to the dependant parents, (dependant father followed by dependant mother).
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 59 - Whether an unmarried person can nominate somebody from outside?
Answer: Ans : Yes. But, on acquiring a ‘Family’ the nomination is treated as invalid and the benefits under EPS-1995 shall be paid to the spouse and children, if any.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 60 - Whether an employee who has not opted for the earlier Family Pension Scheme, 1971 can join the EPS-1995 ?
Answer: Ans : Yes.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 61 - What is the formula for calculating the Pension amount?
Answer: Ans : Pension= (Pensionable Salary (average of last 60 months) X Pensionable Service)/70.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 62 - What is the quantum of pension a member can get on his superannuation?
Answer: Ans : A member who joins the Employees’ Pension Scheme 1995 at the age of 23 and superannuates at the age of 58, and contributing to the (present) wage ceiling of Rs.15000/- may get about Rs.7500/- as pension if service is 35 years.(Pensionable Salary X Pensionable Service)/70 = (15000x35)/70 = 7500
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 63 - How the average salary is determined for granting pension?
Answer: Ans : The average salary is determined only for giving the pension to member. It is the average of last 60 months. (Non-contributory period, if any, is reduced)
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 64 - What are the advantages of taking a Scheme Certificate?
Answer: Ans :  1) It facilitates transfer of Pension Accounts when the employment is changed.  2) If the Holder of Scheme Certificate dies the family will get family pension.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 65 -  In case of death of a member, who was an Ex-serviceman whether family pension is payable or not?
Answer: Ans : Family pension is payable i.e. in addition to the Military Pension, i.e. family pension under Rule 54 of the CCS (Pension) Rules, 1972. (Effective from 27-07-2001 only)
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 66 - Can a member seek exemption from the Pension Scheme?
Answer: Ans : Individual member cannot seek exemption from the Pension Scheme. Only an establishment can seek exemption.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 67 -  At what age a member is eligible for pension?
Answer: Ans : A member is eligible for pension on superannuation at the age of 58 years. If a member leaves employment between 50 and 57 years he can avail the early (reduced) pension.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 68 - What is the service required for giving pension in case of death of the member?
Answer: Ans :  In case of death of a member, The family pension and children pension is payable even after receiving one month’s contribution (including part of the month) for Pension Fund.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 69 - If a member dies to whom the pension is payable?
Answer: Ans : On death of the member the Pension is automatically payable to the spouse (Widow/Widower). In addition, the children are also eligible till attainment of 25 years of age (2 at a time). Any disabled child in the family shall get disabled pension for life apart from the two child pensions.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 70 - In case the employer has failed to pay the pension contribution whether any pension is payable or not?
Answer: Ans : Non-payment of pension contribution by an employer will not affect the grant of Pension. Pension is guaranteed.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 71 - Can a pensioner get pension anywhere in the country?
Answer: Ans : Yes.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 72 - How the pension of a member who works for different establishment is determined?
Answer: Ans : The wages and the service of the member are consolidated to determine the Pension.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 73 - Is there any increase in the pension amount every year?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 74 - When a member avails reduced pension at the age of 50 can he get his full pension on attaining 58 years?
Answer: Ans : No. Once Pension is sanctioned it cannot be altered.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 75 - What are the criteria for determining the date of eligibility for early pension (Before 58) ?
Answer: Ans : The member is required to indicate his option regarding the date from which he requires early pension in the application form. If no date is given in the claim form then the date of application shall be taken as the opted date.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 76 - Can a member avail pension even while he is in service?
Answer: Ans : The member who continues in service even after 58 years can avail the Pension from the age of 58. If a pensioner, who has availed the early pension, may take up employment thereafter and in such cases he will not be eligible to join the Pension Scheme. And the 8.33% contribution from Employer side will go towards EPF fund.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 77 - Can I surrender or sell my full pension for getting a lump sum payment?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 78 - Is it compulsory to withdraw the pension benefit along with the P.F. amount?
Answer: Ans : No. A member can withdraw his PF amount (member share only) and maintain a lien in the Pension Scheme by availing a Scheme Certificate.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 79 - Can I change my Date of Birth/Age?
Answer: Ans : Yes. Date of Birth/Age once given is not normally changed, however it can be changed with proper documentary evidence. You can see the guidelines provided in circular ‘Change of Date of Birth for EPF & EPS members’ dated 03/04/2020, available on our website (https://www.epfindia.gov.in/site_docs/PDFs/Circulars/Y20202021/Circular_on_date_of_Birth_0302020.pdf).
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 80 - Can a married daughter be excluded from receiving the family pension?
Answer: Ans : The marital status has no relevance if the children are below 25 years; they are eligible for family pension in the event of demise of the member.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 81 - If a member is having two wives to whom the family pension is payable?
Answer: Ans :  If the second marriage is legally valid, it is payable to the eldest wife with reference to the date of marriage and on her death, payable to the next surviving widow.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 82 - In the absence of family member whether a pensioner can nominate any other person to receive family pension?
Answer: Ans : No. In the absence of family member on the date of the death of the member (before eligibility for member pension), the family pension is payable to nominee and in the absence of a valid nomination it is payable to dependent father followed by dependent mother. Once the pension is received by the member there is no validity for nomination. A pensioner cannot nominate any person.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 83 - What will be the effect of unemployment period under the Pension Scheme?
Answer: Ans : The unemployment period will be excluded from the actual service. Pension is based on contributory service only.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 84 - Is it possible to exclude my spouse from receiving the family pension?
Answer: Ans : No. The spouse is an automatic beneficiary unless he/she is legally divorced.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 85 - In the absence of family members (family here means the family procreated by the member and not the family in which he/she was born) and nominee, to whom the pension is payable?
Answer: Ans : It is payable to the dependant parents.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 86 - Who is eligible for disablement pension?
Answer: Ans : EPS-95 member irrespective of age and service who is permanently and totally disabled during the employment shall be entitled to Pension. A member applying for benefits under this provision shall be required to undergo such medical examination prescribed by the Central Board to determine whether or not he or she is permanently and totally unfit for the employment which he or she was doing at the time of such disablement.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 87 - Why a pensioner’s widow gets lesser pension when compared to non-pensioner’s widow?
Answer: Ans : The pension and family pension under Employees’ Pension Scheme, 1995 are the Social Security benefits. It is viewed as a need based benefit. It is not related to the quantum of contribution paid by a member. A pensioner after attaining the age of 58 years is to take care of his spouse and in his absence the liability is restricted to one person. Hence 50% of the pension is payable. Whereas in the case of a member (non-pensioner) who dies leaving behind his spouse, children who are yet to complete their education, marriage etc. and also considering the pre-mature death of a member the quantum of pension payable to non-pensioner’s widow is on the higher side.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 88 - Whether family pension is payable to a widow who was married to a pensioner? (After his superannuation)
Answer: Ans : The widow of a pensioner is eligible for family pension (irrespective of the date of marriage whether prior to his superannuation or thereafter)
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 89 - In case the widow or widower remarries, to whom the family pension is payable?
Answer: Ans : The pension payable to the widow/widower will be stopped and thereafter the children pension will be converted to orphan pension (75% of the widow pension).
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 90 - What is the period up to which pension is payable to the widow or widower?
Answer: Ans : Pension is paid till the remarriage of the widow/widower or till death.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 91 - When a member is having children through his first and second wife, how the eligibility for children pension is determined?
Answer: Ans : The children of both first and second wife should be arranged in the order of their date of birth and then the children pension is allowed to the eldest two children but below 25 years of age.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 92 - Is it necessary to open a separate bank account to draw the child pension?
Answer: Ans : Yes.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 93 - Can the widow and children draw pension in different places/banks?
Answer: Ans : No. The pension should be drawn by widow and children in the same bank and branch.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 94 - Who is eligible to get a Scheme Certificate?
Answer: Ans :  A member whose service is 10 years or more and not attained the age of 58 years will be mandatorily issued scheme certificate. A member whose service is less than 10 years can avail the Scheme Certificate to carry forward his pension service but it is not mandatory for such member.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 95 - Whether a member/family member can avail more than one pension for one service under the Employees’ Pension Scheme, 1995?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 96 - When and to whom the pensioner is to give a life and non-remarriage certificate?
Answer: Ans : All pensioners drawing pension under Employees’ Pension Scheme, 1995 are required to give a Life/Non-Remarriage Certificate, duly attested by the Bank Manager/Gazetted Officer after 12 months from the month in which the pension was sanctioned or date of submission of last Life certificate.  Physical Life Certificate is to be submitted to the Bank through which the pension is being paid. Failure to submit Life Certificate after one year will result in stoppage of pension after 12 months from the date of submission of last Life Certificate or sanction of pension in case of new Pensioners. In place of physical life certificate ‘Digital Life Certificate’ (DLC) has been introduced from the financial years 201516. Now Pensioners can use their Aadhaar number to submit the DLC. The facility to submit DLC is available in ‘Common Service Centers’ (CSCs), branches of Pension Disbursing Banks, ‘Post Offices’ through ‘India Post Payment Banks’ (IPPB) as well as PF offices.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 97 - Whether a Scheme Certificate holder with a service period of 8 years can avail the withdrawal benefit on surrender of Scheme Certificate?
Answer: Ans : Yes. But it is advisable that the member should complete 10 years of pensionable service so that he gets eligible for pension under the EPS 1995 on attaining the age of 50 years (early/reduced pension) or 58 years (superannuation pension).
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 98 - Whether the Orphan Children are eligible for double Orphan Pension where both the parents were making contributions under Employees’ Pension Scheme, 1995?
Answer: Ans : Yes. The benefit under the Pension Scheme is a direct consequence of the contributions paid by the member of EPS, 1995; hence, if both parents were members and have contributed independently to the said Scheme, the Orphan will be eligible to two pensions separately. The normal ceiling as provided for in the Employees’ Pension Scheme shall however, continue to apply.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 99 - Whether Withdrawal Benefit will be payable to a member in case of defaulting establishment?
Answer: Ans : In respect of an establishment defaulting in remitting contribution to the Employees’ Pension Fund 1995 for any period, withdrawal benefit will not be paid to the member in respect of the default period. The member is entitled to withdrawal benefits only in respect of the period for which the contributions are received.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 100 - Whether member can delay the pension beyond 58 years?
Answer:
Ans : Yes, the member has option to delay the pension beyond 58 years:
1) Member can opt for receiving pension after attaining 59 or 60 years of age but pension contribution stops after 58 years. In this scenario quantum of pension is increase by 4% per year beyond 58 years.
2) Member can opt for receiving pension after attaining 59 or 60 years of age but pension contribution continues after 58 years. In such a scenario the quantum of pension shall be higher than the first case cited above.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 101 - Whether Assurance benefit under EDLI Scheme is payable for death occurring after leaving the service?
Answer: Ans : No. Admissible only in case of death while in service.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 102 - To whom the EDLI benefit is payable?
Answer: Ans : EDLI benefit is payable to the persons eligible to receive the EPF dues.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 103 - Whether Assurance Benefit is payable to missing EPF member?
Answer: Ans : Payment of Assurance Benefit under EDLI Scheme 1976 is only available on the member’s death while in service to the nominees/legal heirs.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 104 - What is the maximum quantum of Assurance benefit?
Answer: Ans : Currently, the maximum assurance benefit is Rs.600,000/-.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 105 - Can a member withdraw the entire amount through money order?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 106 - Whether pension can be paid by money order or cheque?
Answer: Ans : Pension is payable through the designated banks notified for each region through Core Banking Solution.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 107 - What is the Universal Account Number?
Answer: Ans : Universal Account Number (UAN) is a 12 digit number allotted to each subscriber by linking it to the member’s currently active PF account number (from 31/07/2014 to 30/11/2016). From 12/2016 any new member has to be allotted a Universal Account Number linked to the establishment’s code number.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 108 - Who allots the Universal Account Number?
Answer: Ans : The number is allotted by EPFO on the request of the Employer and populated in the Employer’s login in the unified portal www.unifiedportal-emp.epfindia.gov.in.  The UAN can also be generated by any individual using his/her aadhaar if his UAN is not already generated.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 109 - What are the advantages of having a UAN?
Answer:
Ans : Once the member has activated his/her UAN on the unified portal he can enjoy the following benefits:
Download/Print your Updated Passbook anytime.
Download/ Print your UAN Card.
List all your Member IDs to UAN.
File online transfer claim on OTCP
Update your KYC information.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 110 - How can I know the status of my UAN?
Answer: Ans : The facility is available in the unified portal at https://unifiedportal-mem.epfindia.gov.in.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 111 - How can I know the balance in my PF account?
Answer: Ans : Please activate your UAN and check/download your passbook.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 112 - How can I know the status of my application for PF settlement, advance or transfer submitted to the EPF office?
Answer: Ans : Please use the url https://passbook.epfindia.gov.in/MemClaimStatusUAN/ for checking your claim status.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 113 - Whether a PF member can submit claims for settlement without attestation of the Employer?
Answer: Ans : Currently the member can submit 3 types of claims without attestation of Employer namely, Form-19, 10C and 31. However, the member must ensure that his UAN is activated and at least the bank account and Aadhaar KYC’s in respect of his account are approved by the Employer using his Digital Signature Certificate.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 114 - What is the Composite Claim Form?
Answer:
Ans : EPFO has launched a consolidation of the settlement claim forms. Accordingly one composite claim form (Aadhaar & Non Aadhaar) has been issued to replace the existing claim forms no.19, 10C and 31 and UAN forms no.19, 10C & 31. 
Another composite form replaces the existing Form no.20, 10D & 5-IF.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 115 - I want to know more about Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation.
Answer: Ans : Please visit EPFO Website: www.epfindia.gov.in
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 116 - Who can be member of EPFO?
Answer: Ans : A person who is employed for wages in any kind of work, manual or otherwise, in or in, connection with the work of a establishment covered under the Employees’ Provident Funds & Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1952, and who gets his wages directly or indirectly from the employer, and includes any person employed by or through a contractor in or in connection with the work of the establishment.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 117 - Who can be a member?
Answer: Ans : An employee of a covered establishment, if not excluded, is compulsorily a member of the employees’ Provident Funds Scheme. The employer of the establishment himself makes the employee a member by following prescribed procedure. An excluded employee is an  employee  whose  pay  at  the  time  of  being  a  member  exceeds  Rs. 15,000/- per month
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 118 - Can a member contribute at a higher rate (above 12%) on voluntary basis?
Answer: Ans : Yes
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 119 - What is contribution rate payable for a member?
Answer: Ans : At present, an employee contributes 12% of the Basic wages + Dearness allowance + Retaining allowance in EPF. The employer also pays 12% of pay out of which 8.33% of pay is diverted to Pension Fund and the rest 3.67% is diverted to EPF.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 120 - Does a member contribute to employees’ Pension Scheme and employees’ Deposit-Linked Insurance Fund Scheme (EDLI)?
Answer: Ans : No. The employer pays 12% out of which 8.33% is diverted to Pension Fund. An employer also pays 0.5% of Pay in EDLI Scheme.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 121 - What are benefits available to EPF members?
Answer:
Ans : 
Advances: A member can take non-refundable advances during service period for various purposes:-
Treatment of illnesses of self/family: TB, leprosy, paralysis, cancer, mental derangement heart ailment ,pandemic or major surgical operation
Marriage of self, daughter, son, brother & sister.
Post-matriculation education of son/daughter
Withdrawal for purchase of house, flat, dwelling house, addition/alteration of house and repayment of loan for the purpose.
Withdrawal within one year before retirement: Upto 90% of total PF balance. 
Advance on unemployment: Upto 75% of total PF balance. 
Other purposes (for details please see table below)
Final settlement: On retirement or two months after ceasing to be an employee. 
Pension after retirement subject to the eligibility
Insurance in case of death while in service.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 122 - What are the different types of non-refundable advances?
Answer:
Ans : 
S.N.Para of EPF Scheme 1952PurposeEligibilityAmount admissible
1.62Financing of Member’s Life Insurance Policies

A policy in the name of the member.
Policyshouldbe legally assigned to
CBT (EPF).
Employees’ share should have sufficient balance to pay the premium.
2.68-B, 68-BC,68- BD
Purchaseof House/flat, including acquisition of land.Five years membership of the Fund.
Employees’shareis more than Rs 1,000/-
Twenty four months wages & DA or total balance in PF account(Employees’ +Employer) or total cost, whichever is less.

After five years another part withdrawal equal to 12 months wages & DA or employees’ share for addition/alteration.

After ten years from the original sanction, another part withdrawal equal to 12 months wages & DA or employees’ share for addition/alteration.

3.68-BBRepayment of housing loan.Loan should have been taken from notified agencies. 10 years membership of Fund. employees’ share in PF account should be more than Rs 1,000/-
Thirty six months wages & DA or total balance in PF account (employees’ + employer share) or total outstanding loan & interest thereon, whichever is less
4.68-BCPurchase of House/flat, including acquisition of land.Five years membership of the Fund. employees’ share is more than Rs 20,000/-
Total balance in PF account office member or cost of acquisition, whichever is less.
 5.68-BDPurchaseof House/flat, including acquisition of land.Three years membership of the Fund. Member of a registered Cooperative Society. Employees’ share is more than Rs 25,000/- 90% of PF accumulation (both shares) or cost payable, whichever is less.Employees’shareis more than Rs 25,000/-

1.68-HIfestablishment / factory is closed/locked downEmployee receives no compensation or has not got wages for two months or more.Upto 100% of employees’ share.
2.68HHIf the employee remains unemployed for more than one month
Unemployment should be more than one monthUpto75%oftotalPF balance.
3.68-JIllnessof self and familyHospitalization  for more than one month, major illnesses or major surgery.Basic Wages & DA for six months or employees’ share, whichever is less.
4.68-KMarriage (self ,children ,brother & sister) or post matriculation education of childrenSevenyears’ membership of fund. employees’ share in PF balance is more than Rs 1,000/- Only three withdrawals allowed.50% of employees’ share.
5.68-LNatural calamityNatural calamity declaration by State Government & proof of damage to property.not exceeding the basic wages and dearness allowances of that member for three months or up to seventy-five per cent. of the amount standing to his credit in the Fund, whichever is less. 
6.68-MCut in electricity in factory/establishmentCut in electricity supplied by State Government.Wages for a month or Rs 300/- or employees’ share, whichever is less.
7.68-NPhysically handicapped members for purchaseof equipmentOn account of physical handicap.Basic Wages & DA for six months or  employees’ share or cost of equipment, whichever is less.
8.68-NNWithdrawal one year before retirement.Age of member is 54 years and above90% of total PF balance
9.68-NNNFor investment in Varishta Pension Bima Yojana.Age of member is 55 years and above90% of total PF balance.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 123 - What are the documents required to be submitted for availing above advances?
Answer: Ans : No document is required to be submitted.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 124 - What are the other facilities available for the member?
Answer:
Ans : 
Member portal: EPFO provides UAN based online account of member data on EPF website secured with login password. 
Passbook: for updated balance
Online claim filing: A member can file online EPF claims for various benefits through member portal if the EPF account is seeded with Aadhar, PAN & Bank account. 
Online filing of transfer claim from previous account to new EPF account in case of job change from one covered EPF establishment to another EPF Covered establishment. 
Modified Declaration form (Form No-11) for automatic transfer of Funds: Member can effect transfer of EPF Fund from previous account to new account without transfer claim if both account is linked with UAN and Aadhar seeded.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 125 - Which forms to be filled for claiming benefits
Answer:
Ans : 
For Final settlement/Withdrawal benefits/Advances: Composite Claim form (Aadhar/non-Aadhar) 
Scheme certificate: Form 10C
For pension: Form 10D
For transfer of previous account balance to new account: Form 13
For nomination of family members: Form 2
Declaration of previous service: form 11
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 126 - How to submit claim form?
Answer:
Ans : 
Online: If PF account is seeded with Aadhaar, PAN and Bank account is updated. Only Composite Claim Form (Aadhaar) for PF final withdrawal, Pension withdrawal benefits and PF non-refundable advances can be filed online.
Offline: All type of claims.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 127 - How to Update Bank account?
Answer: Ans : A member can update his bank account through member portal which is then approved by employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 128 - How much time is taken to settle claim?
Answer: Ans : As per EPF Scheme, a claim is required to be settled within 20 days.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 129 - How do I get my grievances redressed?
Answer: Ans : A complainant can lodge his/her grievance online on – https://epfigms.gov.in. If the complainant has UAN/Establishment/PPO number then he can directly enter his respective detail and fill his/her grievance category and description of grievance along with uploading supporting documents. Thereafter his grievance is forwarded to the concerned PF office which is linked to its UAN/Establishment/PPO number, If the complainant does not have UAN/Establishment/PPO number then he/she can register his grievance in Others category where he has to fill all the details along with the PF Office to which the grievance pertains.  After successfully lodging the grievance a unique registration number is  generated  and sent  on his mobile number or on email id. The complainant can see/check the status/disposal of his grievance on the above mentioned portal through registration number. The EPFiGMS is an interactive portal as the complainant can add additional supporting document pertaining to his grievance and EPFO offices too can ask for documents as well as seek further inputs from the complainant regarding his/her grievance.  The EPFiGMS portal also has the provision for seeking feedback from the complainant with respect to quality of redressal of his/her grievance in the form of star ratings.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 130 - What is KYC?
Answer:
Ans : KYC (Know Your Customer) is member’s data updation to improve the services of EPFO for members. These KYC details include PAN, Aadhaar and Bank Account details.
 
If you have not yet updated these details on the EPFO Member Portal, you may do it now.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 131 - How can I update KYC?
Answer: Ans : Member can update KYC details online in EPFO’s UAN Portal.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 132 - What are the benefits of KYC?
Answer: Ans : Claim can be submitted through online mode without attestation of the employer. A member can view his monthly contribution statement by logging on UAN portal.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 133 - What are KYC documents that can be submitted?
Answer:
Ans : Following documents are considered for KYC – 
National Population Register
AADHAR
Permanent Account Number (PAN)
Bank Account Number
Passport
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 134 - How do I apply for correction in KYC/members’ details?
Answer: Ans : In order to update or change in KYC (Know your customer) detail on UAN EPFO portal, a member requires UAN (Universal Account Number). Member can login to  EPFO UAN portal and update KYC by uploading necessary documents online. Online request for correction in name, date of birth and gender has been introduced.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 135 - What is UAN?
Answer: Ans : UAN (Universal Account Number) is a unique 12 digit number allotted to a member. It is a permanent number and remains valid throughout the life of a member. It does not change with the change of employment. UAN helps in automatic transfer of Funds and PF withdrawals.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 136 - Who can generate UAN and How I can get my UAN?
Answer: Ans :  Your Employer can generate the UAN. In case of change in employment, the previously allotted UAN may be provided to the employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 137 - How Aadhaar is seeded with UAN?
Answer: Ans : Member can seed his Aadhar through Member portal, after UAN is activated by employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 138 - How PAN is seeded with UAN?
Answer: Ans : Member can seed his PAN through Member portal, after UAN is activated by employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 139 - How bank account is seeded with UAN ?
Answer: Ans : Member can seed his Aadhar through Member portal, approved by employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 140 - What  are the benefits of  Aadhaar,  PAN &Bank accounts details seeded with UAN ?
Answer:
Ans : 
 Member can submit claims through online mode
 Member can file claim directly without employer’s signature.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 141 - What is an Inoperative Account?
Answer:
Ans : An account is classified as Inoperative account in which contribution has not been received for 3 years after retirement or permanent migration abroad or in case of death.
At present, all accounts will earn interest upto 58 years age of a member.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 142 - Will my inoperative account earn interest?
Answer: Ans : No. However, at present, all accounts will earn interest upto 58 years age of a member.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 143 - What should I do if my account becomes inoperative?
Answer: Ans : If you are still working in an establishment covered under EPF & MP Act, 1952, you should get the amount transferred into your new account either by online or offline mode. If you have retired then you may withdraw the amount.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 144 - Will my withdrawal be subject to deduction of income tax (TDS)?
Answer:
Ans :  In case a member withdraws his EPF and has rendered less than 5 years of service and accumulated amount is more than Rs. 50,000/, TDS shall be applicable on the following rates:-
Submission of PANNon submission of PANNo TDS deducted in case of
If 15G/15H is submitted, no TDS is deductedIf 15G/15H is not submitted,TDS deducted at 10%TDS is deducted at Maximum Marginal Rate (34.606%)Transfer of FundPayment of advanceService is terminated by employer beyond control of employee
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 145 - Will tax be deducted at source (TDS) if my service is more than 5 year (60 months)
Answer: Ans : No.The service rendered at previous as well as present employer would be added to arrive at total service.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 146 - What is the benefit of providing PAN?
Answer: Ans : If a member provides/link PAN and the PF balance is more than Rs. 50,000/ and service rendered is less than 5 years, then tax (TDS) would be deducted @10% and not at 34.606%.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 147 - What is Form 15G/15H?
Answer:
Ans : Form 15G and Form 15H are declarations which can be submitted to receive payments without deduction of tax in case of members having total annual income of Rs. 2.50 lacs and 3.00 lacs respectively. Form 15H is applicable for Senior Citizens (60
 
years or older) whereas Form-15G is for everybody else. Also, a member must have a PAN before applying in these forms.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 148 - How many copies of 15G/15H have to be submitted?
Answer: Ans : Two copies of form 15G/15H, whichever is applicable, are to be submitted with the claim forms.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 149 - How to file Nomination form for EPF?
Answer: Ans : Form No-2 is prescribed under Employees Provident Fund, employees’ Pension Scheme and Employee’s Deposit Link Insurance Scheme for submitting family and nomination details.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 150 - What are benefits of submitting Form No-2?
Answer: Ans : In case of a members’s death, the family can get the benefit PF/Pension/Insurance without any delay.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 151 - How do I fill Form No-2?
Answer: Ans : Member can submit Form No.-2 online through the employer. E-sign facility has also been extended to the members to submit Form No.-2 online. In case, new family member is added, the EPF member should fill Form No- 2 to update the details in EPFO. Form No.-2 can be submitted online as well as offline mode.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 152 - What if my employer is not available to sign the claim form or the establishment has closed down?
Answer: Ans :  In such a scenario, the claim form may be attested by the Manager of the Bank in which your savings Bank Account is currently maintained. Or where the employee finds it difficult to get the attestation of the employer, the member can update the KYC by submitting a request to concerned field office duly attested by one of the authorised officials, The complete list of authorised officials is as prescribed in para 10.18 of the MAP Vol. II.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 153 - Am I required to affix revenue stamp of Re 1/- on the claim forms?
Answer: Ans : No.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 154 - Is it compulsory to enclose cancelled original cheque with the claim form?
Answer: Ans : Yes. A cancelled original cheque bearing name of the member, his bank account number and IFS Code of the bank should be printed on the cheque itself.In case, members’s bank account is ‘without cheque-book’ facility, then copy of first page of passbook duly attested by the employer or the bank manager may be enclosed with the claim form.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 155 - What is Composite Claim Form (Non-Aadhaar)?
Answer: Ans : Composite Claim Form (Non-Aadhaar) is a single page form for settlement of PF final withdrawal, pension withdrawal benefits and PF non-refundable advances. The claim is required to be submitted offline and attested by the employer.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 156 - What is Composite Claim Form (Aadhaar)?
Answer:
Ans : Composite Claim Form (Aadhaar) is a single page form for settlement of PF final withdrawal, pension withdrawal benefits and PF non-refundable advances. It can be submitted both in online as well as offline mode and does not require the attestation of the employer. This form is applicable in cases where employees’ complete details in
 
Form No-11 (New), Aadhaar number and Bank Account details are available on UAN Portal and UAN has been activated.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 157 - Are the payments made through NEFT (National Electronic Funds Transfer)?
Answer: Ans : All payments are made electronically through NEFT or CBS (Core-Banking Solutions).
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.

Question: 158 - What does Commutation of Pension mean ?
Answer: Ans : Commutation of Pension means payment of lump sum amount in lieu of a portion of pension surrendered voluntarily by the pensioner. This option has been deleted with effect from 26.09.2008.
instruction: Provide an accurate and concise response to the following question related to EPFO in english.
